meanings.definition: bend (one's head or body) downward and forward
meanings.sent1: She coudes to pick up the fallen pen.
meanings.sent2: He coudes to tie his shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: The cat coudes to sneak under the table.
meanings.sent4: The flower coudes towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The tree coudes gracefully in the wind.

meanings.definition: a joint in the middle of the arm where it bends
meanings.sent1: His coudes were sore after lifting weights.
meanings.sent2: She rested her head on her coudes while reading.
meanings.sent3: The robot had shiny metal coudes.
meanings.sent4: The old door creaked at its rusty coudes.
meanings.sent5: The doll's arms had movable coudes.
